pages.text: $(li)The Nether Fortress is a large structure that can be found in the Nether.$(br)$(li)This place is inhabited by $(l:patchouli:creatures/vanilla/wither_skeleton)Wither Skeletons$(/l), $(l:patchouli:creatures/vanilla/blaze)Blazes$(/l).$(br)$(li)Here you can find $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/nether_wart)Nether Wart$(/l), an important ingredient for brewing potions.
$(li)Blaze Spawners can be found here too, and these sometimes makes appears $(l:patchouli:creatures/outvoted/wildfire)Wildfires$(/l).
